reviews.review_content:
Fabulous Class! Professor Uperesa presents the material in an extremely interesting, cutting-edge and multifaceted framework.  She was extremely responsive to what her students were saying, encouraged discussion, presided over class with a refreshing vibrancy, and always dealt fairly and with a touch of humor. Overall a wonderful person to learn from - if you're looking for a class that will give you the room to explore the world a bit differently, give this a shot.
Workload:
Lots and lots of reading, some hard, some downright pleasurable. Two short papers and a longer final one.
